entity.name: activity
entity.query: SELECT ACT.id, ACT.name AS activity_name, ACT.description AS activity_description, ACT.cost, ACT.max_capacity, ACT.num_open, ACT.max_age, ACT.min_age, ACT.membership_required, ACT.status, ACT.start_date, ACT.end_date, ACT.created_date, ACT.last_modified_date, ACT.activity_series_id FROM activity AS ACT JOIN provider AS PRO ON ACT.provider_id=PRO.id WHERE (ACT.status=1 AND PRO.status=1)
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT ACT.id FROM activity ACT JOIN provider AS PRO ON ACT.provider_id=PRO.id WHERE ACT.last_modified_date > DATE_SUB('${dataimporter.last_index_time}', INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AND (ACT.status = 1 AND PRO.status=1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT ACT.id, ACT.name, ACT.description, ACT.cost, ACT.max_capacity, ACT.num_open, ACT.max_age, ACT.min_age, ACT.membership_required, ACT.status, ACT.start_date, ACT.end_date, ACT.created_date, ACT.last_modified_date, ACT.activity_series_id FROM activity ACT WHERE ACT.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: SELECT ACT.id FROM activity AS ACT WHERE ACT.status!=1 AND ACT.last_modified_date > DATE_SUB('${dataimporter.last_index_time}', INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)

entity.name: activity_series
entity.query: SELECT IF(SERIES_DATA.series_amount > 0, SERIES_DATA.series_name, '${dataimporter.functions.escapedSql(activity.activity_name)}') AS name, IF(SERIES_DATA.series_amount > 0, SERIES_DATA.series_description, '${dataimporter.functions.escapedSql(activity.activity_description)}') AS description FROM (SELECT COUNT(SERIES.id) AS series_amount, SERIES.name AS series_name, SERIES.description AS series_description FROM activity_series AS SERIES WHERE SERIES.id = '${activity.activity_series_id}') AS SERIES_DATA

entity.name: activity_option_values
entity.query: SELECT GO.name AS activity_option_name FROM reservation.activity_option AO, global_option GO WHERE AO.activity_id = '${activity.id}' AND AO.option_id = GO.id

entity.name: activity_options_cost
entity.query: SELECT IF(AO.cost_override, MIN(AO.cost_override), AC.cost) AS min_cost, IF(AO.cost_override, MAX(AO.cost_override), AC.cost) AS max_cost FROM activity_option AO, activity AC WHERE AO.activity_id = AC.id AND AO.activity_id = '${activity.id}'

entity.name: activity_categories
entity.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_activity_categories FROM activity_categories WHERE activity_id='${activity.id}'

entity.name: leaf_categories
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT(CAT.parent_id) AS top_level_category_ids, PARENT_CAT.name AS top_level_category_names, CAT.id AS leaf_category_ids, CAT.name AS leaf_category_names FROM category AS CAT JOIN activity_categories AS AC ON CAT.id=AC.category_id JOIN activity AS ACT ON AC.activity_id=ACT.id JOIN category AS PARENT_CAT ON CAT.parent_id=PARENT_CAT.id WHERE ${activity_categories.num_activity_categories} > 0 AND ACT.id='${activity.id}' AND CAT.depth=2 AND PARENT_CAT.id=CAT.parent_id

entity.name: prov_leaf_categories
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT(CAT.parent_id) AS top_level_category_ids, PARENT_CAT.name AS top_level_category_names, CAT.id AS leaf_category_ids, CAT.name AS leaf_category_names FROM category AS CAT JOIN provider_categories AS PC ON CAT.id=PC.category_id JOIN provider AS PRO ON PC.provider_id=PRO.id JOIN category AS PARENT_CAT ON CAT.parent_id=PARENT_CAT.id WHERE ${activity_categories.num_activity_categories} = 0 AND PRO.id='${activity.provider_id}' AND CAT.depth=2 AND PARENT_CAT.id=CAT.parent_id

entity.name: events
entity.query: SELECT AE.instructor AS event_instructor, AE.event_start AS event_start, AE.event_finish AS event_finish FROM activity_event AS AE WHERE AE.activity_id='${activity.id}' AND AE.status=1 ORDER BY AE.event_start ASC LIMIT 1

entity.name: last_event
entity.query: SELECT AE.event_start AS event_last_event_start, AE.event_finish AS event_last_event_finish FROM activity_event AS AE WHERE AE.activity_id = '${activity.id}' AND AE.status = 1 ORDER BY AE.event_finish DESC LIMIT 1

entity.name: provider
entity.query: SELECT PRO.id AS provider_id, PRO.name AS provider_name, ADDR.id AS address_id, VE.id AS vendor_id, IF(PRO.booking_method IS NOT NULL, PRO.booking_method, VE.booking_method) AS booking_method, IF(ADDR.latitude IS NOT NULL AND ADDR.longitude IS NOT NULL,CONCAT(ADDR.latitude,',',ADDR.longitude),NULL) AS provider_coordinates, IF(ADDR.latitude IS NOT NULL AND ADDR.longitude IS NOT NULL,ADDR.city,NULL) AS provider_city, IF(ADDR.latitude IS NOT NULL AND ADDR.longitude IS NOT NULL,ADDR.address_state,NULL) AS provider_state, IF(ADDR.latitude IS NOT NULL AND ADDR.longitude IS NOT NULL,ADDR.zip_code,NULL) AS provider_zip_code FROM provider AS PRO JOIN activity AS ACT ON ACT.provider_id=PRO.id JOIN vendor AS VE ON PRO.vendor_id=VE.id LEFT JOIN service_address AS ADDR ON ADDR.id=IF(ACT.service_address_id IS NOT NULL,ACT.service_address_id,PRO.service_address_id) WHERE ACT.id ='${activity.id}'
